event.description: Alfredo Amezaga strikes out swinging.
Dan Uggla flies out to center fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Hanley Ramirez doubles (10) on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Spilborghs.

Jorge Cantu singles on a line drive to left fielder Seth Smith. Hanley Ramirez scores. Jorge Cantu out at 2nd on the throw, left fielder Seth Smith to catcher Yorvit Torrealba to first baseman Todd Helton.
Wes Helms flies out to left fielder Seth Smith.
Cody Ross strikes out swinging.
Jeremy Hermida pops out to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki.
Ronny Paulino flies out to right fielder Brad Hawpe.
Josh Johnson called out on strikes.
Alfredo Amezaga strikes out on a foul tip.
Dan Uggla triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a line drive to left fielder Seth Smith. Dan Uggla scores.
Jorge Cantu strikes out swinging.
Wes Helms strikes out swinging.
With Cody Ross batting, Hanley Ramirez steals (5) 2nd base, . Hanley Ramirez advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by first baseman Todd Helton.
Cody Ross grounds out, third baseman Garrett Atkins to first baseman Todd Helton.
Jeremy Hermida grounds out, pitcher Jorge De La Rosa to first baseman Todd Helton.
Ronny Paulino walks.
Josh Johnson out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Yorvit Torrealba to second baseman Ian Stewart. Ronny Paulino to 2nd.
Alfredo Amezaga strikes out swinging.
Dan Uggla hit by pitch.
Hanley Ramirez pops out to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki.

Josh Johnson strikes out swinging.
Alfredo Amezaga grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.
Dan Uggla called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Jason Grilli replaces Jorge De La Rosa, batting 1st, replacing left fielder Seth Smith.
Defensive switch from center field to left field for Ryan Spilborghs.
Dexter Fowler remains in the game as the center fielder.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Brad Hawpe.
Jorge Cantu strikes out swinging. Hanley Ramirez steals (6) 2nd base.
Wes Helms grounds out, first baseman Todd Helton to pitcher Jason Grilli. Hanley Ramirez to 3rd.
Cody Ross singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler. Hanley Ramirez scores.
With Brett Carroll batting, Cody Ross steals (1) 2nd base.
Brett Carroll flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Seth Smith pops out to second baseman Dan Uggla.
Troy Tulowitzki singles on a line drive to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Todd Helton lines out softly to second baseman Dan Uggla.
Brad Hawpe grounds out to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Ryan Spilborghs grounds out, first baseman Jorge Cantu to pitcher Josh Johnson.

Jorge De La Rosa grounds out, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Seth Smith singles on a ground ball to second baseman Dan Uggla.
Troy Tulowitzki called out on strikes.
Todd Helton lines out to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Brad Hawpe singles on a ground ball to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga.
Ryan Spilborghs grounds into a double play, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to second baseman Dan Uggla to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Brad Hawpe out at 2nd.
Garrett Atkins reaches on a missed catch error by first baseman Jorge Cantu, assist to pitcher Josh Johnson.
Ian Stewart called out on strikes.
Yorvit Torrealba grounds out to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Garrett Atkins to 2nd.
Jorge De La Rosa grounds out, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Seth Smith grounds out, second baseman Dan Uggla to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Troy Tulowitzki singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Todd Helton pops out to shortstop Hanley Ramirez.
With Brad Hawpe batting, Troy Tulowitzki caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Ronny Paulino to shortstop Hanley Ramirez.
Defensive Substitution: Brett Carroll replaces left fielder Jeremy Hermida, batting 7th, playing left field.
Brad Hawpe singles on a ground ball to right fielder Cody Ross.
Ryan Spilborghs strikes out swinging.
Garrett Atkins strikes out swinging.
Ian Stewart lines out to left fielder Brett Carroll.
Yorvit Torrealba flies out to right fielder Cody Ross.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Dexter Fowler replaces Jorge De La Rosa.
Dexter Fowler singles on a ground ball to right fielder Cody Ross.
Seth Smith singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Cody Ross. Dexter Fowler to 3rd.
Troy Tulowitzki grounds out, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Dexter Fowler scores. Seth Smith to 2nd.
Todd Helton grounds out to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Pitching Change: Matt Lindstrom replaces Josh Johnson, batting 9th.
Brad Hawpe strikes out swinging, catcher Ronny Paulino to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Ryan Spilborghs singles on a ground ball to left fielder Brett Carroll.
Garrett Atkins walks. Ryan Spilborghs to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Clint Barmes replaces Garrett Atkins.
Ian Stewart called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Iannetta replaces Yorvit Torrealba.
